thread.title: Train Derailment In El Segundo Forces Road Closure
thread.title_full: Train Derailment In El Segundo Forces Road Closure

author: Jonathan Polakoff
title: Train Derailment In El Segundo Forces Road Closure
text:
EL SEGUNDO (CBSLA.com) — A train derailed in El Segundo Thursday afternoon, forcing the closure of a local street and snarling traffic in the area.
El Segundo police advised drivers to avoid Douglas Street between El Segundo Blvd. and Rosecrans Ave.
It was not immediately clear what the train was hauling.
No injuries or evacuations were reported.
This is a developing story. Check back for updates.
